description: In-cab device collecting planting - spraying - harvest data from equipment CAN bus
equipment_compatibility: JD / Case IH / NH / AGCO combines and planters - ISO 11783 / J1939
key_features: Automatic data collection from CAN bus - plug-and-play - no wiring changes

description: Core data platform with satellite imagery - field health - scouting - data layers
equipment_compatibility: Platform agnostic - works with any equipment via FieldView Drive or manual upload
key_features: Satellite imagery - field health maps - scouting notes - basic analytics - data storage

description: Premium platform adding yield analysis - scripts - advanced analytics
equipment_compatibility: Platform agnostic - full integration with FieldView Drive and seed advisor
key_features: Yield analysis - seed performance scripts - advanced weather - field comparison

description: Data-driven seed selection and variable rate seeding prescriptions
key_features: Seed placement optimization - VRS prescriptions - hybrid-by-environment matching

description: iPad-based in-cab app for real-time field visualization during operations
key_features: Live coverage map - field health overlay - scouting - photo geo-tag

description: High-resolution satellite crop health monitoring with anomaly detection
key_features: Regular satellite imagery - NDVI - crop health anomaly alerts

description: Multi-layer crop health analysis from satellite and aerial sources
key_features: Zone management - temporal analysis - problem area identification

description: Post-harvest yield map analysis with profitability layers
equipment_compatibility: All combines with yield monitors via FieldView Drive
key_features: Yield map cleaning - hybrid performance comparison - profit/loss by zone

description: Web and mobile data upload for operations without FieldView Drive
equipment_compatibility: Any equipment - manual CSV or shapefile upload
key_features: Upload planting - application - harvest data from any source

description: Data sharing API connecting FieldView with third-party platforms
equipment_compatibility: Integrates with JD Operations Center - CNH PLM - AGCO Fuse - Trimble - Ag Leader
key_features: Two-way data sharing - prescription push - as-applied pull
